ValidationRule.description: Requirements to move past Negotiating: Use Case
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Qualifying")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Working")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Quoting")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Negotiating")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Best Case")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Lost")) ),
ISNULL( Use_Case__c ),
DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) > DATE(2024,02,12), NOT( Validation_Omission__c )
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Cannot progress opportunity without detailing the Customer's use case for this deployment.
